meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>fold</kanji> you can see with your <kanji>eye</kanji> is a <vocabulary>fold</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>crease</vocabulary> in something.
readingMnemonic: The readings are both kun'yomi vocab readings. You should have seen 折る by now which should help you to read 折り. Then there's 目, which I'm guessing you won't have a problem with.
